caseName: MacDermid Printing Solutions LLC v. Cortron Corp

recap_documents.description: ORDER. The Court DENIES Cortron's motion for judgment as a matter of law (ECF No. 436) and motion for directed verdict (ECF No. 402), and DENIES Cortron's motion for a new trial (ECF No. 436) provided that MacDermid agree to a remitted awar d of $19,757,854 in compensatory damages. MacDermid shall file on the docket within 14 days of this ruling a statement either accepting a modified compensatory award in the amount of $19,757,854 or opting for a new trial. MacDermid's m otion for punitive damages, attorney's fees, offer-of-compromise interest, and declaratory and injunctive relief (ECF No. 437) is GRANTED IN PART AND DENIED IN PART, and the Court awards $27,538,889 in punitive damages. The Court reserves decision on the matter of attorney's fees and offer-of-compromise interest. Signed by Judge Michael P. Shea on 1/20/2015. (Luedeman, R.)
